HEADER.Title: This will be used to create json on agent machine

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
! --------------- JSON file path ----------------------------------------- : SET &AGENT_CURR_DIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) : SET &UC4RB_TDM_FILENAME# = "&$TOP_PROCESSFLOW_RUNID#.JSON" : set &UC4RB_TDM_JSON_FILE_PATH# = STR_CAT(&AGENT_CURR_DIR#,&UC4RB_TDM_FILENAME#)
! ----------------- Writing JSON File------------------------------------- : PRINT &UC4RB_TDM_CONFIG_JSON# : SET &HND# = CREATE_PROCESS(NEW) : SET &RET# = PUT_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#, &UC4RB_TDM_CONFIG_JSON#) : SET &RET# = WRITE_PROCESS(&HND#,&UC4RB_TDM_JSON_FILE_PATH#,&AGENT#,&LOGIN#,OVERWRITE) : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# : IF &RET# > 0 : PRINT "Error in writing file to path : &UC4RB_TDM_JSON_FILE_PATH#" : ENDIF : PUBLISH &UC4RB_TDM_JSON_FILE_PATH#,,"WORKFLOW"

DOCU_Docu.DOC: This includes creates a json file.
